description: The OTT platforms are ready with the new releases, as the weekend approaches. From highly anticipated web series Saare Jahan se Accha, to horror drama Andhera, and more, there’s a lot to binge-watch this weekend. Streaming will be available on Netflix, JioHotstar, Zee 5, Sony LIV, and more.
title: OTT Releases This Week (August 11 - 17): Saare Jahan se Accha, Andhera, Tehran, Alien: Earth, and More

description: Jim Lovell, legendary NASA astronaut and commander of Apollo 13, has died at 97. Renowned for turning a life-threatening lunar mission into a historic survival story, Lovell flew four pioneering spaceflights, including Apollo 8. His steady leadership during crisis inspired generations and cemented his place as one of space exploration’s most respected figures.
title: Apollo 13 Commander Jim Lovell, Hero of Space Crisis, Dies at 97

description: China has launched the eighth batch of satellites for its Guowang internet constellation, lifting off on Aug. 13 aboard a Long March 5B rocket from Wenchang Space Launch Center. Operated by state-owned China SatNet, Guowang aims to deploy about 13,000 satellites in low Earth orbit to compete with SpaceX’s Starlink. Each launch so far has carried only eight to ten relatively large satellites. The mission marks the fourth Guowang launch in less than three weeks, underscoring China’s push to accelerate global broadband coverage and strengthen its position in the satellite-internet market.
title: China Advances Guowang Internet Constellation with Latest Satellite Launch

description: On June 26, 2025, a dazzling daytime fireball streaked over Georgia, captured by satellites and witnessed across multiple states. A surviving fragment smashed through the roof of a McDonough home, denting the wooden floor 14 feet below. Scientists at the University of Georgia analyzed about 23 grams of this ancient rock, determining it to be a 4.56-billion-year-old L-type ordinary chondrite — older than Earth by nearly 20 million years. Likely originating from the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, it may have been dislodged by a colossal collision 470 million years ago. Dubbed the McDonough Meteorite, it offers rare clues to the early solar system’s history and asteroid risks.
title: Cosmic Visitor: 4.56-Billion-Year-Old Meteorite Strikes into Georgia Home

description: In July 2025, the European Space Agency’s Mars Express orbiter captured a high-resolution image of Acheron Fossae, a region marked by deep chasms and ridges on Mars’s surface. These features, created by ancient crustal stretching, split the terrain into raised horsts and sunken grabens. Valley floors reveal smooth surfaces carved by slow-moving, ice-rich rock glaciers, forming rounded knobs and mesas. Scientists believe these structures date back 3.7 billion years, during Mars’s most geologically active era. The presence of rock glaciers hints at ancient ice ages, suggesting the Red Planet once had climatic cycles capable of supporting frozen water flow over vast periods, reshaping its landscape.
title: ESA’s Mars Express Discovers Deep Valleys and Frozen Features Hinting at Mars’ Icy Past

description: Platforms like Zomato, Swiggy, Blinkit, and others are running special sales as part of Independence Day 2025. There are payment-based discounts and free delivery offers. Blinkit, Zepto, and Swiggy Instamart are providing up to 50 percent off on groceries, gadgets, and daily essentials. Zomato is offering its Gold membership for three months for Rs. 1.
title: Independence Day 2025: Up to 60 Percent Discount on Swiggy, Zomato, Zepto and More

description: A Physical Review Letters study likens deep neural network feature learning to spring-block mechanics, linking data simplification to spring extension and nonlinearity to friction. The model reveals how noise can balance separation across layers and help predict performance, offering a powerful tool to optimise training, improve generalisation, and enhance efficiency in large AI systems.
title: New Physics-Based Model Sheds Light on How Deep Neural Networks Learn Features

description: A new study suggests “black hole morsels” — tiny, asteroid-sized black holes from cosmic mergers — could emit detectable bursts of Hawking radiation. Observatories like HESS, HAWC, and Fermi may already hold clues. Detecting them could unlock insights into quantum gravity, unknown particles, and even hidden dimensions beyond the Standard Model.
title: Scientists Apply Stephen Hawking's Theory to Propose Detectable ‘Black Hole Morsels’ in Space

description: 84 Toh Baad has emerged as a must-watch for fans of intense, thought-provoking Punjabi cinema. Set in a turbulent period of history, it blends suspense and emotional storytelling, offering both entertainment and reflection. Available on Chaupal, the series has been noted for its strong performances and realistic depiction of 1984’s aftermath.
title: 84 Toh Baad Now Available for Streaming on This OTT Platform: A Gripping Punjabi Thriller Exploring the Shadows of 1984

description: Written and directed by Benedict Mique, Isolated is a psychological horror movie that revolves around a nurse and a patient who have been impacted by a violent intruder. Things take a wild turn when the duo is trapped with the body of a child in a room. Will they be able to escape? Watch Now.
title: Isolated Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: Super-Earths are among the most common planets in the galaxy, yet none exist in our solar system. Larger than Earth but smaller than Neptune, they range from ocean-covered worlds to scorched, atmosphere-less rocks. Some orbit within habitable zones, making them prime candidates for life. NASA’s Kepler and TESS missions, along with upcoming telescopes like JWST, are unraveling their mysteries—exploring their atmospheres, compositions, and potential to host life. These discoveries could reshape our understanding of planet formation and the conditions that make a world truly habitable.
title: NASA Missions Uncover a Diverse Galaxy of Super-Earths, Raising New Questions About Planetary Evolution

description: A geopolitical thriller, covering the story of a cop, who is honest and patriotic towards his nation, set during the time of Russia and Ukrainian war, and Iran and Israel, are having their dispute, the cop gets stuck, as Iran targets him, and his country doesn't support him, hence exposing the system of the nation, Tehran is now streaming on ZEE5.
title: Tehran Now Streaming on ZEE5: What You Need to Know About John Abraham Starrer High-Stakes Spy Thriller

description: Honor will launch the X7c 5G in India on August 18, exclusively via Amazon, in Forest Green and Moonlight White shades. It will feature a 6.8-inch full-HD+ 120Hz display with 850 nits brightness, dual stereo speakers, IP64 dust and splash resistance, and SGS drop certification.
title: Honor X7c 5G India Launch Date Set for August 18; to Be Available Exclusively via Amazon

description: Reliance Digital's discount sale started with discounts on smartphones such as the Pixel 9a, Samsung Galaxy S25+, iPhone 13, and Vivo T4 Lite are listed with reduced prices. The MacBook Air (M1) and iPad A16 are also available with discounts. Axis and ICICI bank customers can avail extra offers.
title: Reliance Digital India Sale: Google Pixel 9a, Samsung Galaxy S25+, iPhone 13 Get Discounts

description: Russia, through its media and internet regulator, Roskomnadzor, has reportedly imposed a partial restriction on voice calls made via two instant messaging apps, WhatsApp and Telegram. The regulator said that it took this step to better fight crime. Moreover, the regulator said that several law enforcement agencies and citizens appealed that the two instant messaging services had become the primary calling service for deception and extortion.
title: Russia Imposes Partial Restrictions on WhatsApp, Telegram Voice Calls

description: The UK government's Department of Environment is asking its citizens to delete their old emails and pictures to save water, as the country faces a drought. The UK says that this will minimise the usage of data centres, which require vast amounts of water to keep them cool. However, this is not a problem specific to the UK. As more people start to adopt AI, the power consumption and heat generation by data centres are rising fast.
title: Delete Old Emails to Save Water? UK Govt's Unusual Plea Highlights Global Crisis

description: HTC Vive Eagle, the company’s artificial intelligence (AI) smart glasses, were launched on Thursday. The wearable devices mark HTC’s entry into the display-less smart glasses category. It comes with an in-built AI assistant which can be powered by Google’s Gemini or OpenAI’s GPT, the latter is currently available in beta.
title: HTC Vive Eagle AI Smart Glasses Launched With Snapdragon AR1 Gen 1 SoC, AI Assistant: Price, Specifications

description: Nothing has announced its  Independence Day Sale in india. It is currently live through e-commerce websites and offline retail outlets. Nothing and CMF-Branded smartphones, earphones, smartwatches and other accessories are getting discounts in the Independence Day Sale.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Pro, Phone 3a, CMF Phone 2 Pro, More Discounted in Nothing's Independence Day Sale

description: Sony has revealed the games joining PS Plus Game Catalog in August. This month's Game Catalog titles include Mortal Kombat 1, Marvel's Spider-Man, Sword of the Sea, and more. Game Catalog is available to PS Plus Deluxe/ Premium subscribers.
title: PS Plus Game Catalog Adds Mortal Kombat 1, Marvel's Spider-Man and Sword of the Sea in August

description: The Tecno Spark Go 5G features a 6.76-inch HD+ 120Hz display, a MediaTek Dimensity 6400 SoC, and a 6,000mAh battery. It offers AI tools like the Ella AI assistant, which supports multiple Indian languages, as well as the AI Writing Assistant, and Google’s Circle to Search features. The handset has a 50-megapixel rear camera with 2K video recording capacity, a 5-megapixel front camera, and No Network Communication support.
title: Tecno Spark Go 5G Launched in India With 6,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Main Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition was launched in 2024. However, a new leak suggests that the US-based tech giant is currently working on a new e-reader, which could be called the Kindle Petit Color. The moniker has not been finalised yet, but the prototype of the tablet shows it in White, with thick bezels and a colour display.
title: Amazon's Next Color Kindle Leaked Hinting "Petit Color" Could Be a Cheaper Alternative

description: The Croma Independence Day Sale 2025 is live in India until August 17, offering major discounts on products ranging from smartphones, laptops, and wearables to large appliances like ACs, refrigerators, and washing machines. Shoppers can also enjoy additional benefits, including bank and exchange offers. ICICI Bank credit card users get an additional 10 percent instant discount of up to Rs. 3,000, further reducing prices and boosting savings. We’ve put together a list of the top discounts on the Croma site that you should check out now.
title: Croma Independence Day Sale 2025: See Top Deals on Smartphones, Smartwatches, Home Appliances and More

description: Google is adding a couple of new features to its artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, Gemini. On Wednesday, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced personalised responses and Temporary Chats for Gemini’s Android app. The first is a personalisation capability that allows the AI chatbot to fetch information from previous conversations to tailor the responses to the user’s preferences.
title: Gemini App for Android Gets a ChatGPT-Like Privacy Feature and Personalised Responses

description: The FASTag Annual Pass will be effective starting August 15. The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) is commemorating India's 79th Independence Day. As part of the celebration, the ministry will start allowing people to get their hands on a FASTag Annual Pass. Best suited for frequent commuters, people will be able to save up to Rs. 33,000 every year.
title: Independence Day 2025: FASTag Annual Pass Price Breakdown

description: iPhone 17 Air leaks have been surfacing online for a while. Although the Cupertino tech giant has yet to confirm the launch, a dummy of the handset, in the “Sky Blue” colourway, has appeared online in a video. The rumoured Apple handset, which is expected to feature a sleek design, was earlier said to be offered in four colour options - Black, Light Blue, Light Gold, and White. However, the latest tip suggests that the Light Blue colourway might be named Sky Blue.
title: iPhone 17 Air Dummy in Sky Blue Colourway Shown in a Video Online; Reveals Design

description: The iPhone 17 series is likely to go official next month. Apple is expected to host a dedicated September launch event where it will unveil the next-generation iPhone models. Although the Cupertino-based tech giant remains pretty tight-lipped on the exact launch date, leaks have given us an idea of when the event might take place. Based on the trend of yesteryears, we can deduce when Apple will announce the iPhone 17 launch event.
title: iPhone 17 Series Launch Countdown Begins: This Is When Apple Can Announce September Event

description: Samsung is rumoured to be working on several smartglasses currently. While the headline maker device is its Project Moohan, an extended reality (XR) headset that was first unveiled in December 2024, the company is also working on Project Haean, a smartglass with an augmented reality (AR) display. The latter was showcased by the South Korean tech giant at Google I/O 2025.
title: Samsung’s Display-Less AI Smartglasses are Reportedly Delayed to Next Year

description: Vijay Sales Mega Freedom Sale is now live in India. Buyers can avail of price cuts, bank offers, and exchange bonuses to purchase gadgets at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates. During the sale, the omni-channel retail company is offering discounts of up to 60 percent on smartphones. Flagship handsets such as the iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro Max, and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra have seen their prices plunge for a limited time.
title: Vijay Sales Mega Freedom Sale: Deals on iPhone 16 Pro Max, iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, and More

description: The Vivo T4 Pro is set to launch in India soon. Vivo, through X, announced the launch of a new handset in the country. It will be available for purchase on Flipkart. The Vivo T4 Pro is confirmed to offer 3x periscope zoom. It is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset.
title: Vivo T4 Pro Teased to Launch in India Soon; to Be Available on Flipkart

description: Google in July announced a new feature called Remix for its Photos app. While it is yet to be made available for devices widely, the tech giant has now shed more light on how it works. As per Google, the Remix feature leverages generative artificial intelligence (AI) to transform normal selfies, portraits, or pet photos into artistic styles, such as 3D animation, anime, sketch, and more. It is built into the Photos app and is separate from the default photo editor.
title: Google Photos’ Remix Feature Uses AI to Turn Your Photos Into Artistic Styles: How to Use It

description: iQOO 15 is tipped to launch in China in October. It is said to feature a 2K resolution display. It could run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset. iQOO recently teased the existence of the QOO 15. It could be launched alongside the iQOO 15 Pro or the iQOO 15 Ultra model.
title: iQOO 15 Launch Timeline Leaked; May Pack 2K Samsung AMOLED Display, Gaming Chip

description: The Xiaomi 16 and 16 Pro are expected to feature 50-megapixel front cameras with a wide field of view, autofocus, and support for 4K 60fps video recording. Both are expected to have 50-megapixel 1/1.3-inch primary rear sensors, with the Pro adding ultra-high dynamic range and a ToF sensor. The handsets may also come with upgraded Leica features. The Xiaomi 16 may launch in September with the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC and a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Xiaomi 16 and Xiaomi 16 Pro Camera Upgrades Leaked; Tipped to Get 50-Megapixel Selfie Cameras

description: Amazon, in a recent statement, announced that its customers in over 1,000 cities and towns in the US will now be able to get same-day delivery of perishable goods, such as fruits, vegetables, cereals, and other groceries. The US-based e-commerce giant will charge a fee for same-day delivery. However, customers with an Amazon Prime membership will be able to avail of the service free of charge for orders above $25 (approximately Rs. 2,186).
title: Amazon Plans to Expand Same-Day Grocery Delivery Service in Over 2,300 US Cities

description: Apple is reportedly planning to launch a range of artificial intelligence (AI)-powered devices and features in the next few years. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant remains bullish on generative AI and aims to catch up to the rest of the market as soon as possible. The company reportedly plans to introduce a tabletop robot with a display, a speaker with a smart display, and a security camera.
title: Apple Reportedly Planning to Launch an AI-Powered Tabletop Robot That Can Interrupt Users, Other Devices

description: The higher end of the budget smartphone segment thanks to premiumisation is now dripping with technology, fancy designs and new features. There’s phones that really stand out like the Nothing Phone 3a and rather underrated battery beasts like the Vivo T4 5G. And there’s even the Poco X7 Pro 5G, which gets buyers a taste of everything in one smartphone.
title: Best Mobile Phones Under Rs. 25,000 in India: From Motorola Edge 60 Fusion, Nothing Phone 3a and More

description: Crimson Desert, the upcoming open-world action-adventure title from South Korean developer Pearl Abyss, has been delayed. The game has been pushed back to Q1 2026 from its late 2025 release window, the studio confirmed at its Q2 FY 2025 earnings call on Thursday.
title: Crimson Desert Delayed to Q1 2026 Due to Console Certification, Voice Overs, Other Launch Preparations

description: WhatsApp is reportedly rolling out a Writing Help assistant feature powered by AI Private Processing for select beta users. The new functionality will allow users to enhance their messages using AI-powered assistance. It was reportedly spotted on WhatsApp beta for Android 2.25.23.7 update.
title: WhatsApp May Soon Assist You With Message Writing; Suggests Latest Android Beta Update

description: A new report reveals official case images for the Google Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro XL, showing a familiar design but with built-in magnets. A visible ring inside the case indicates magnetic support, similar to Apple’s MagSafe. Previously, a leaked render showed the Pixel 10 with a charging puck attached directly to its back, hinting at integrated magnets for wireless charging support. The puck is expected to be part of Google’s rumoured Pixelsnap Qi2 accessory line.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Official 'Pixelsnap' Cases Leaked Ahead of August 20 Launch

description: With the launch of the iPhone 17 series a month away, rumours have now begun to surface rapidly. According to a tipster’s claims, the iPhone 17 Pro will receive a price hike this year and could cost more than the iPhone 16 Pro. However, there will be a benefit, with users getting double the amount of base storage on the purported handset. Meanwhile, other models in the lineup are also speculated to come with higher price tags.
title: iPhone 17 Pro May Start at Roughly Rs. 1,24,900 but Offer Double the Base Storage, Claims New Leak

description: Ride-hailing platform Rapido launched a food delivery app in India on Wednesday. Named Ownly, it is reportedly a zero-commission platform that aims to provide food items at rates comparable to the offline market. According to a report, it focuses on delivering affordable food, with items such as rice and eggs priced below Rs. 100. However, the app is currently available only on the Google Play Store and serviceable in a few areas in the Bengaluru vicinity.
title: Rapido Launches 'Ownly' Food Delivery App With a Promise of Delivering Affordable Meals Under Rs. 150

description: The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH) in June announced a cost-effective and more seamless travel solution for frequent commuters in India. It allows the free passage of non-commercial and private cars, jeeps, and vans on designated National Highways (NH) and National Expressways (NE). From price and benefits to validity, here is everything you need to know about the FASTag Annual Pass.
title: Explainer: FASTag Annual Pass Price, Benefits and Validity, Everything You Need to Know

description: This Independence Day, witness the ultimate sense of patriotism with the top releases and some older releases blending to give you a binge-worthy weekend. Top releases include Saare Jahan se Accha and Tehran, while Kajol Starrer Sarzameen, and more are ready for a watch.
title: Best OTT Movies and Series to Watch This Independence Day: Saare Jahaan Se Accha, Sarzameen, and More
